SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT h.id,h.house_num,h.project_id,building_id,floor_id,house_type, actual_area,gross_area,usable_area,apportion_area, property_fee,sale_status,ownership, ph.pay_type, p.name FROM property.t_house h left join property.t_proprietor_house ph on h.house_num = ph.house_num and h.project_id = ph.project_id left join property.t_proprietor p on ph.proprietor_id = p.id
) t

SELECT h.id, h.house_num, h.project_id, building_id, floor_id, house_type, actual_area, gross_area, usable_area, apportion_area, fs.price as property_fee, sale_status, ownership, pay_type, p.name as name, p.id as proprietorId, ph.use_type as useType, pj.full_name as projectName, pb.name as buildingName, pf.name as floorName FROM property.t_house h left join property.t_proprietor_house ph on h.house_num = ph.house_num and h.project_id = ph.project_id left join property.t_proprietor p on ph.proprietor_id = p.id left join property.t_project pj on h.project_id = pj.id left join property.t_project_building pb on h.building_id = pb.id left join property.t_project_building pf on h.floor_id = pf.id left join property.t_fee_setting fs on fs.project_id = ph.project_id and fs.use_type = ph.use_type and fs.fee_type = '4' Where h.id = #{id}
mapper.sql: (SELECT p.id AS projectId, p.full_name AS projectName, pb.id AS buildingId, pb.name AS buildingName, pf.id AS floorId, pf.name AS floorName, CONCAT(pb.code, pf.code, hs.num) AS houseNum, h.id AS houseId, hs.id AS houseSpecId, sd.name AS houseType, pro.name AS name, p.oem_code AS oemCode FROM property.t_project p LEFT JOIN property.t_project_building pb ON pb.project_id = p.id LEFT JOIN property.t_project_building pf ON pf.parent_id = pb.id LEFT JOIN property.t_house_spec hs ON hs.building_id = pb.id LEFT JOIN property.t_house h ON h.house_num = CONCAT(pb.code,pf.code,hs.num) AND h.project_id = p.id LEFT JOIN property.t_proprietor_house phs ON phs.house_num = h.house_num AND phs.project_id = h.project_id LEFT JOIN property.t_proprietor pro ON pro.id = phs.proprietor_id LEFT JOIN property.t_sys_dict sd ON sd.group_code = 'HOUSE_TYPE' AND sd.value = hs.house_type WHERE CONCAT(pb.code,pf.code,hs.num) IS NOT NULL ORDER BY p.id)

SELECT v.* FROM AS v
ORDER BY v.houseNum
SELECT SUM(IF(v.houseId IS NOT NULL, 1, 0)) AS initializedCount, SUM(IF(v.houseId IS NULL, 1, 0)) AS noInitializeCount FROM AS v

SELECT v.projectId, v.projectName, v.buildingId, v.houseId, v.houseNum, v.oemCode FROM (( SELECT p.id AS loginId, h.project_id AS projectId, pj.full_name AS projectName, h.id AS houseId, h.building_id AS houseId, h.house_num AS houseNum, h.oem_code AS oemCode, 'user' AS type FROM property.t_house h LEFT JOIN property.t_proprietor_house ph ON ph.house_num = h.house_num AND ph.project_id = h.project_id LEFT JOIN property.t_proprietor p ON p.id = ph.proprietor_id LEFT JOIN property.t_project pj ON pj.id = h.project_id ) UNION ALL ( SELECT r.id AS loginId, h.project_id AS projectId, pj.full_name AS projectName, h.id AS houseId, h.building_id AS houseId, h.house_num AS houseNum, h.oem_code AS oemCode, 'resident' AS type FROM property.t_house h LEFT JOIN property.t_resident_house rh ON rh.house_id = h.id LEFT JOIN property.t_resident r ON r.id = rh.resident_id LEFT JOIN property.t_project pj ON pj.id = h.project_id )) AS v WHERE v.loginId = #{loginId} AND v.oemCode = #{oemCode}
AND v.type = 'user'
AND v.type = 'resident'
ORDER BY v.houseNum
